backend/main.mo: Defines user, trip, and payout types with sorting logic, maintains state maps/lists, and exposes authorization-gated functions for user registration and trip/payout operations.
feature_evidence.json: Reports feature evidence for adding a Developer Story section to the Credits page, listing related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Controls authentication flow, profile initialization, and routing to dashboard or onboarding screens.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthWelcome: Displays the public welcome screen with branding and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button tied to Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Renders role‑specific dashboard views and switches between dashboard, profile, payouts, and credits sections.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Driver: Shows drivers available trips to accept and their list of accepted trips.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Passen: Shows passengers the trip request form and their trip history.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer displaying copyright text and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Responsive header showing logo, user info, and navigation with role‑based items and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps pages with a header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/payouts/DriverEa: Displays driver earnings, balance, and recent completed trip payouts with loading states.
frontend/src/components/payouts/DriverPa: Combines the earnings card, payout request form, and payout history into a single panel.
frontend/src/components/payouts/PayoutHi: Shows a table of payout requests with dates, amounts, and status badges.
frontend/src/components/payouts/PayoutRe: Form allowing drivers to request payouts with validation against available balance.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileF: Editable user profile form supporting name and phone updates with role indicators.
frontend/src/components/profile/RoleSele: Two‑step registration card for choosing a role and entering basic profile details.
frontend/src/components/trips/MyTripsPan: Displays passenger or driver trips with status, details, and related actions, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/trips/OpenTripsL: Lists all open trips for drivers with pickup/dropoff details and an accept button.
frontend/src/components/trips/TripReques: Form for passengers to create a new trip request with pickup, dropoff, and fare inputs.
frontend/src/components/trips/TripStatus: Renders cancel or complete trip actions depending on user role and trip status.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the authenticated identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, trip actions, and driver/passenger-specific trip data using an actor backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes with Sierra Leone–inspired colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/CreditsPage.tsx: Renders a styled credits page highlighting developer Henry English and describing the app’s mission and origin.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended OKLCH color tokens, custom radii, animations, and plugins including typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, existing features, and build-planning state.
